name: MainHall
shortDescription: You are in a huge room with a big door locked with a gold coloured padlock, paintings and a clock on the wall, cages with pet animals in them.
longDescription: You are in a huge room with a big door locked with a gold coloured padlock, paintings and a clock on the wall, 3 cages, one with a mongoose, another with a grey parrot and the last one open.

name: Cellar
shortDescription: Dark and damp, with something written on the wall.
longDescription: Dark and damp, with a writing on the wall that says: Exclusive wines. How sweet!

name: WineRoom
shortDescription: Room with old wine bottles arranged in rows
longDescription: Old wine bottles arranged in lettered rows, a small table with an empty bottle and a torch on one side of the room.

name: Kitchen
shortDescription: Cold, with a large fridge and an island with rotten food.
longDescription: Cold, with a large fridge, an island with rotten food and a sharp knife.

name: Library
shortDescription: Tall bookshelves surrounding the entire room
longDescription: Tall bookshelves surrounding the entire room, a ladder next to the door.

name: Study
shortDescription: Desk with scattered papers, a diary with something written about wines.
longDescription: Desk with scattered papers, a diary with something written about wines and a malfunctioning computer.

name: Bedroom
shortDescription: A woman is chained, hands tied with a rope in this windowless bedroom
longDescription: A woman is chained and chains are locked with a silver padlock, hands tied with a rope in this windowless bedroom

name: Observatory
shortDescription: A circular room with tall, arching windows and a telescope, entrance to attic on the north side.
longDescription: A circular room with tall, arching windows and a telescope pointing towards stars in the night sky, entrance to attic on the north side.

name: Attic
shortDescription: Totally dark with no access to light where soft whispers echo and unseen presences lurk.
longDescription: Totally dark with no access to light where soft whispers echo and unseen presences lurk. You can smell the dirt.
